mapper.select: select id, title,excerpt, categoryid, ccount, rcount, creator, createTime from post where id = #{id}
select id, title,content, categoryid, parent from post where id = #{id}

select p.id, p.title, excerpt, c.name as category, p.rcount, p.ccount, p.creator, p.createTime from post p left join category c on p.categoryid=c.id where p.type=#{query.type} order by p.createTime desc
select id, title,parent from post where type='page' and parent='Root'
select id, title, rcount, createTime from post where type='post' order by createTime desc limit 10
select p.id, p.title, p.excerpt, p.creator, p.createTime from post p inner join category c on p.categoryid=c.id where c.name=#{query.categoryName} and p.type=#{query.type} order by p.createTime desc
mapper.update: update post set title=#{title},excerpt=#{excerpt}, content=#{content, jdbcType=CLOB},parent=#{parent}, categoryid=#{categoryid},lastUpdate=#{lastUpdate} where id=#{id}

update post set categoryid=#{newCategoryId} where categoryid in
#{item}
